physical_appearance:This is a doorway hanging or a toran. It is long
 with a straight rectangular top and several dangling panels at the bottom. It features cotton weave with embroidery work. It is decorated with stylized embroidery of figures
 animals
 birds
 foliage
 flowers and deities. At the top of the toran there is a repeated geometric pattern.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a doorway hanging or a toran. It is long, with a straight rectangular top and several dangling panels at the bottom. It features cotton weave with embroidery work. It is decorated with stylized embroidery of figures, animals, birds, foliage, flowers and deities. At the top of the toran there is a repeated geometric pattern.
metadata.subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) deities depictions (visual works) birds (motifs) beadwork (visual works)
